Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Strong expression in the testis, liver, gall bladder and kidney. Also expressed in the ovary and male and female reproductive tracts. Expressed in the ovarian stroma and the theca and granulosa layers of the ovarian follicle. Developmental stage
